RestfulClient
public class BasicRestfulClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements RestfulClient

Provides an API for communicating with RESTful web services.

setConnectionTimeout

public void setConnectionTimeout(int timeout)
Description copied from interface: RestfulClient
Sets the connection timeout in milliseconds. This is the timeout used until a connection is established with the web service.

Specified by:
setConnectionTimeout in interface RestfulClient
Parameters:
timeout - the timeout to set in milliseconds

setResponseTimeout

public void setResponseTimeout(int timeout)
Description copied from interface: RestfulClient
Sets the response timeout in milliseconds. This is the timeout for waiting for data from the web service. A timeout of zero is interpreted as an infinite timeout.

Specified by:
setResponseTimeout in interface RestfulClient
Parameters:
timeout - the timeout to set in milliseconds
